name: Foley Pro
description:
Foley Pro is a fun app for creating your life soundtrack in real time!

Foley is the art of producing everyday sound effects which are used in film and video productions.
The soundtrack of a movie is incredibly important to set the scene. Now life can be like that for you too. iSoundtrack is a simple app which allows you to easily play a fanfare when entering a room, give thunderous applause, laughter, jeer, crack a whip, fire a Glock or a M60 and a bunch of other things to delight or annoy yourself or those around you!

Give it a go and see how it works for you and those around you! You can live your life like it's a movie! (sort of)
